prop.name: required
prop.description: Does input required to fill? Also with function type you can pass function with one argument (fn(value){}) and return Boolean value.

prop.name: autoHeight
prop.description: Calculate and set height of element at runtime.

event.name: input
event.description: Fired when component request to change value.

note: This component wrapped to normal html textarea element, so custom events and attributes are available on this.
